author: Dr15Jones
body:
An upcoming framework change now will require that if one requests data that is made in the job, e.g. TriggerResults, that the module be placed on a Path or EndPath such that it can get that data. 

This pull request changes two cases where the implicit failing to get TriggerResults was being used to allow the module to run. Now in both cases we explicitly set what data we want or if we should ignore the data for this job.
title: Fix DQM use of TriggerResults
